scripts.build:dev: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run makepot
scripts.build:js: echo "$(tput setaf "3")Building JS Files$(tput sgr0)"; for f in $npm_package_assets_js_src; do file=${f%.js}; echo "$(tput setaf "3")Building $f$(tput sgr0)"; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m > $file.min.js; done
scripts.build:css: echo "$(tput setaf "3")Building CSS Files$(tput sgr0)"; sass -I node_modules/bourbon/core -I node_modules/susy/sass assets/css:assets/css --style compressed --no-source-map && sass -I node_modules/bourbon/core -I node_modules/susy/sass style.scss:style.css --style compressed --no-source-map
scripts.postbuild:css: npm run autoprefixer && npm run rtlcss
scripts.autoprefixer: echo "$(tput setaf "3")Running Autoprefixer$(tput sgr0)"; for f in $npm_package_assets_css_min; do file=${f%.css}; postcss $f --use autoprefixer -r --verbose --no-map; done
scripts.rtlcss: echo "$(tput setaf "3")Building RTL CSS$(tput sgr0)"; for f in $npm_package_assets_css_min; do file=${f%.css}; rtlcss $f $file-rtl.css; done
scripts.makepot: echo "$(tput setaf "3")Updating POT file$(tput sgr0)"; wpi18n addtextdomain storefront; wpi18n makepot --domain-path languages --pot-file storefront.pot --type theme --exclude node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint:ci: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.test:e2e: npm run wp-env run tests-cli 'wp theme activate storefront' && jest
